biotools.summary: The Cancer Predisposition Sequencing Reporter (CPSR) is a computational workflow that interprets and classifies germline DNA variants identified from next-generation sequencing in the context of cancer predisposition and inherited cancer syndromes. The workflow can also report incidental findings (ACMG v3.0) as well as the genotypes of common germline variants associated with cancer risk, as reported in the NHGRI-EBI GWAS catalog.
